executable.title: Write Out Image Intensities

image.name: inputVolumeInXAxis
image.description: The Input image to be computed for statistics
image.label: Input Image In X Axis

image.name: inputVolumeInYAxis
image.description: The Input image to be computed for statistics
image.label: Input Image In Y Axis

image.name: inputMaskVolumeInXAxis
image.description: Input mask volume for inputVolumeInXAxis. Histogram will be computed just for the masked region
image.label: Input mask image In X Axis

image.name: inputMaskVolumeInYAxis
image.description: Input mask volume for inputVolumeInYAxis. Histogram will be computed just for the masked region
image.label: Input mask image In Y Axis

string.name: outputJointHistogramImage
string.description: output joint histogram image file name. Histogram is usually 2D image.
string.label: OutputDataFilename
